title: Love Languages & Blended Families
itunes:summary:
Knowing and learning to speak your spouse's love language can revolutionize your marriage. The same is also true for those in blended families. John, Greg, and Erin share about ways they've seen how applying the love language principles can positively impact marriages. Featuring Dr. Gary Chapman and Mr. Ron Deal.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Building Love Together in Blended Families" for your donation of any amount! https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-09-13?refcd=1468603


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/love-languages-blended-families/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1460508


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
